title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip-installable wrapper around the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; available on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLMs, embedders, and tool callers.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich chat web UI for Ollama (renamed to Open WebUI); Docker-ready with multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven Central artifact ‘io.github.amithkoujalgi:ollama4j’.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with conversation history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC support.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight React/Electron desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that lets you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers; NuGet: OllamaSharp.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem ‘ollama’ providing a simple DSL and ActiveRecord-like callbacks for chatting with Ollama.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches model pulls and exposes Ollama as a reproducible CI service.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector enabling BPMN service tasks to call Ollama models for content generation.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform provider to provision Ollama models and chat endpoints on AWS EC2 or Azure VMs.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node that adds Ollama chat and embedding actions to no-code workflows.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama; go-gettable with idiomatic context and streaming support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate ‘ollama’ providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into threads with slash-command support.
